phyf 0.0.0.9000
  • Get started
  • Reference
    • Tree Arithmetic with Phylogenetic Flows
  • Blog

Standardise the phylogenetic flow features to an implied typical variance of 1.

pf_standardise.Rd

Can be used to make random effects based on pfcs comparable.

Usage

pf_standardise(x)

Arguments

x

a pfc object

Value

a scaled pfc object

Examples

pf_standardise(rpfc(100))
#> <pfc<e:198>[198]>
#> First  10 phylogenetic flows: 
#> [1] ◎──0.9169──→ Node8 ──0.0771──→ Node25 ──0.0023──→ Node27 ──0.0054──→ Node37 ──0.0067──→ Node56 ──0.0036──→ Node76 ──0.0024──→ t86
